(Simplified: 伧)
Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: A person 亻 from the farm 倉; 倉 also provides the pronunciation
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 亻 [ rén ] man, person; people
    • 倉 [ cāng ] granary, barn; cabin, berth
①古代譏人粗俗，鄙賤：傖俗，傖荒。傖夫。

傖字的基本解释

傖
cāng

傖
均见“伧”。

傖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cāng］
［《廣韻》助庚切，平庚，崇。］
［《集韻》千剛切，平唐，清。］
“伧1”的繁体字。
(1)粗俗；鄙陋。
(2)引申指卑劣，下贱。
(3)魏晋以来，江东对楚人的蔑称。
(4)晋南北朝时，南人对北人或南渡北人的蔑称。
(5)泛指粗鄙之人。
(6)怯懦。参见“傖頭”。
(7)见“傖儜”。
(8)见“傖”。
[②]［chen˙］
“伧2”的繁体字。
见“寒傖”。

傖字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　傖； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页113第18
【廣韻】助庚切【集韻】【韻會】鋤庚切【正韻】士庚切，?音䚘。鄙賤之稱也。【晉陽秋】吳人謂中州人謂傖，陸機呼左思爲傖，父宋孝武比擬羣臣，目王玄謨爲老傖。【韓愈詩】無端逐饑傖。　又【集韻】千岡切，音倉。傖囊，亂貌。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cāng］
["Guangyun" helps Gengqie, Ping Geng, Chong. ]
["Jiyun" Qiangang cut, Ping Tang, Qing. ]
Traditional characters of "伧1".
(1) Vulgar; contemptuous.
(2) The extension refers to despicableness and lowliness.
(3) Since the Wei and Jin Dynasties, Jiangdong's contempt for Chu people.
(4) During the Jin and Southern and Northern Dynasties, the southerners used the scornful name for the northerners or the northerners who crossed the south.
(5) Refers to a vulgar person in general.
(6) Cowardice. See "Tou Tou".
(7) See "弧儜".
(8) See "伧".
[②]［chen˙］
Traditional characters of "伧2".
See "Han Jia".
rude
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　伧; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 113 18
[Guang Yun] Help Geng Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Hoe Geng Cut [Zheng Yun] Shi Geng Cut,? Yin Qi. Also known as contemptuous. [Jinyangqiu] Wu people said that Zhongzhou people were called Yu, Lu Ji called Zuo Si as Yu, his father Song Xiaowu compared the officials, and Wang Xuanmo was Lao Yu. [Han Yushi] Chasing hunger for no reason.　[Jiyun] Chioka Cut, Otokura. Confused, chaotic appearance.
